name: Smartwool Everyday Hiker Street Crew Socks - Unisex
description: Socks for hiking or for cozying up by the fireplace. The flat-knit toe seam keeps your toes comfortable and the arch brace prevents bunching.Made of soft merino wool and synthetic blend.Arch brace holds sock securely in place.Flat-knit toe seam doesn't cause hotspots or chafing.
